metadata.title: CVE-2014-3875 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The addto parameter to fup in Frams' Fast File EXchange (F*EX, aka fex)before fex-2014053 allows remote attackers to conduct cross-site scripting(XSS) attacks

criterions.comment: fex: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
